name: HuoHua Mobile
overview:
We are building an interest-based social search engine that allows users in real-time match themselves with friends or nearby people with similar local interests. It solves the â€œWho can I go withâ€ problem in local social situations. We also allow users to manage their local interest contacts in circles, such as a local version of Google+.
